text: Today on animation editing in Unreal
Engine, I hope most or all of you were
in my previous session, but if not, let
me catch you up to speed. Um, yesterday
we covered the basics and fundamentals

animating something, a character in a
level sequence. Um, while we touched on

today's going to be all about those
tools and like using them and the ways
that I use them every day.
Um, and again, in case you missed my
previous talk, um, my name is John
Fielding. I've been animating for about
15 years, and in that time I've done
game cinematics, ads, short films,
previs for feature films, um, and now
gameplay animation. Along the way, I've
used all sorts of softwares and covered
the gamut in terms of styles and
processes. And all of that informs how I
animate every day in Unreal. And I
haven't touched Maya in like two years.

back in.
